cards.name: Enraged Zombie
cards.description: A ravenous undead creature driven by insatiable hunger.

cards.name: Phoenix Feather
cards.description: Harness the power of a phoenix's feather to rise from the ashes.

cards.name: Possessed Sword
cards.description: A cursed blade with a malevolent spirit bound within.

cards.name: Forest of Doom
cards.description: Summon an enchanted forest teeming with treacherous traps and mystical creatures.

cards.name: Loyal Knight
cards.description: A valiant knight sworn to protect the kingdom at all costs.

cards.name: Fiery Dragon
cards.description: A fearsome dragon with scales that burn like molten lava.

cards.name: Abyssal Portal
cards.description: Open a gateway to the abyss, unleashing dark and otherworldly energies.

cards.name: Haunted Doll
cards.description: A malevolent doll possessed by the spirit of a vengeful child.

cards.name: Thunder Elemental
cards.description: A powerful elemental creature born of thunderstorms and lightning.

cards.name: Crystal Prism
cards.description: Harness the power of refracted light to create dazzling illusions.

cards.name: Astral Beacon
cards.description: Activate this beacon to call upon celestial entities for aid and guidance.

cards.name: Black Hole
cards.description: Unleash the cosmic forces with the power to devour everything in its path.

cards.name: Ancient Golem
cards.description: A colossal stone golem animated by ancient magic.

cards.name: Time Warp
cards.description: Manipulate time and space to rewrite history or glimpse into the future.

cards.name: Cursed Mirror
cards.description: Peer into this mirror, but beware the dark reflections it may reveal.

cards.name: Venomous Serpent
cards.description: A deadly serpent with venomous fangs and an insatiable appetite.

cards.name: Spectral Banshee
cards.description: A wailing specter that chills the hearts of all who hear its mournful cry.

cards.name: Ironclad Gargoyle
cards.description: A stone gargoyle brought to life, impervious to all but the strongest attacks.

cards.name: Enchanted Amulet
cards.description: Wear this amulet to gain protection from curses and dark magic

cards.name: Sacred Helmet
cards.description: Equip this legendary helmet to gain the protection of divine spirits.
